comment: An app used for generating fake data for the data editing tool themed around plant care.
name: Plant Care (Bulk Data Editing Test)

_attachments.ac9d611a429240c58e99a5f6ca5508b4.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Add Plant</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/B55100FC-10F5-4CED-BD8D-C9B7B6637E93" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Add Plant">
					<plant_name />
					<nickname />
					<description />
					<height_cm />
					<number_of_leaves />
					<last_watered_on />
					<last_watered_time />
					<last_watered_datetime />
					<last_repotted />
					<health_indicators />
					<pot_type />
				</data>
			</instance>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/plant_name" nodeset="/data/plant_name" type="xsd:string" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/nickname" nodeset="/data/nickname" type="xsd:string" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/description" nodeset="/data/description" type="xsd:string" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/height_cm" nodeset="/data/height_cm" type="xsd:double" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/number_of_leaves" nodeset="/data/number_of_leaves" type="xsd:int" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/last_watered_on" nodeset="/data/last_watered_on" type="xsd:date" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/last_watered_time" nodeset="/data/last_watered_time" calculate="double(now())" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/last_watered_datetime" nodeset="/data/last_watered_datetime" calculate="now()" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/last_repotted" nodeset="/data/last_repotted" type="xsd:date" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/health_indicators" nodeset="/data/health_indicators" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/pot_type" nodeset="/data/pot_type" />
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="plant_name-label">
						<value>Plant Name</value>
					</text>
					<text id="nickname-label">
						<value>Nickname</value>
					</text>
					<text id="description-label">
						<value>Description</value>
					</text>
					<text id="height_cm-label">
						<value>Height (cm)</value>
					</text>
					<text id="number_of_leaves-label">
						<value>Number of Leaves</value>
					</text>
					<text id="last_watered_on-label">
						<value>Last Watered On</value>
					</text>
					<text id="last_repotted-label">
						<value>Last Repotted</value>
					</text>
					<text id="health_indicators-label">
						<value>Poor Health Indicators</value>
					</text>
					<text id="health_indicators-yellow_leaves-label">
						<value>Yellow Leaves</value>
					</text>
					<text id="health_indicators-pests-label">
						<value>Pests</value>
					</text>
					<text id="health_indicators-fungus-label">
						<value>Fungus</value>
					</text>
					<text id="health_indicators-root_rot-label">
						<value>Root Rot</value>
					</text>
					<text id="pot_type-label">
						<value>Pot Type</value>
					</text>
					<text id="pot_type-ceramic-label">
						<value>Ceramic</value>
					</text>
					<text id="pot_type-terra_cotta-label">
						<value>Terra Cotta</value>
					</text>
					<text id="pot_type-plastic-label">
						<value>Plastic</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/plant_name" ref="/data/plant_name">
			<label ref="jr:itext('plant_name-label')" />
		</input>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/nickname" ref="/data/nickname">
			<label ref="jr:itext('nickname-label')" />
		</input>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/description" ref="/data/description">
			<label ref="jr:itext('description-label')" />
		</input>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/height_cm" ref="/data/height_cm">
			<label ref="jr:itext('height_cm-label')" />
		</input>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/number_of_leaves" ref="/data/number_of_leaves">
			<label ref="jr:itext('number_of_leaves-label')" />
		</input>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/last_watered_on" ref="/data/last_watered_on">
			<label ref="jr:itext('last_watered_on-label')" />
		</input>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/last_repotted" ref="/data/last_repotted">
			<label ref="jr:itext('last_repotted-label')" />
		</input>
		<select vellum:ref="#form/health_indicators" ref="/data/health_indicators">
			<label ref="jr:itext('health_indicators-label')" />
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('health_indicators-yellow_leaves-label')" />
				<value>yellow_leaves</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('health_indicators-pests-label')" />
				<value>pests</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('health_indicators-fungus-label')" />
				<value>fungus</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('health_indicators-root_rot-label')" />
				<value>root_rot</value>
			</item>
		</select>
		<select1 vellum:ref="#form/pot_type" ref="/data/pot_type">
			<label ref="jr:itext('pot_type-label')" />
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('pot_type-ceramic-label')" />
				<value>ceramic</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('pot_type-terra_cotta-label')" />
				<value>terra_cotta</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('pot_type-plastic-label')" />
				<value>plastic</value>
			</item>
		</select1>
	</h:body>
</h:html>
_attachments.a96f69dce02049eb8daa9c89df282aa0.xml:
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
  <h:head>
    <h:title>Water Plant</h:title>
    <model>
      <instance>
        <data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/A6EC3E43-707B-49E0-8628-B930AD94B400" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Water Plant">
          <default_label/>
        </data>
      </instance>
      <bind vellum:nodeset="#form/default_label" nodeset="/data/default_label"/>
      <itext>
        <translation lang="en" default="">
          <text id="default_label-label">
            <value> This is your follow up form. Delete this label and add questions for any follow up visits. </value>
          </text>
        </translation>
      </itext>
    </model>
  </h:head>
  <h:body>
    <trigger vellum:ref="#form/default_label" ref="/data/default_label" appearance="minimal">
      <label ref="jr:itext('default_label-label')"/>
    </trigger>
  </h:body>
</h:html>
_attachments.c625ddbda28a4f568b9922c3ac1182e9.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Registration Form</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/195A8D85-AB8E-40A3-93E7-70709D520CDD" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Registration Form">
					<room_name />
					<description />
					<room_id />
					<room_barcode />
					<water_info>
						<distance_from_window_cm />
						<min_water_required />
						<water_ratio />
					</water_info>
					<light_level />
					<room_location />
					<plant_surfaces />
				</data>
			</instance>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/room_name" nodeset="/data/room_name" type="xsd:string" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/description" nodeset="/data/description" type="xsd:string" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/room_id" nodeset="/data/room_id" type="xsd:string" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/room_barcode" nodeset="/data/room_barcode" type="barcode" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/water_info" nodeset="/data/water_info" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/water_info/distance_from_window_cm" nodeset="/data/water_info/distance_from_window_cm" type="xsd:int" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/water_info/min_water_required" nodeset="/data/water_info/min_water_required" type="xsd:double" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/water_info/water_ratio" nodeset="/data/water_info/water_ratio" vellum:calculate="#form/water_info/distance_from_window_cm * #form/water_info/min_water_required" calculate="/data/water_info/distance_from_window_cm * /data/water_info/min_water_required" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/light_level" nodeset="/data/light_level" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/room_location" nodeset="/data/room_location" type="geopoint" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/plant_surfaces" nodeset="/data/plant_surfaces" />
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="room_name-label">
						<value>Room Name</value>
					</text>
					<text id="description-label">
						<value>Description</value>
					</text>
					<text id="room_id-label">
						<value>Room ID</value>
					</text>
					<text id="room_barcode-label">
						<value>Room Barcode</value>
					</text>
					<text id="water_info-label">
						<value>Water Info</value>
					</text>
					<text id="water_info/distance_from_window_cm-label">
						<value>Distance from Window (cm)</value>
					</text>
					<text id="water_info/min_water_required-label">
						<value>Min Water Required</value>
					</text>
					<text id="light_level-label">
						<value>Light Level</value>
					</text>
					<text id="light_level-low_light-label">
						<value>Low Light</value>
					</text>
					<text id="light_level-shade-label">
						<value>Shade</value>
					</text>
					<text id="light_level-cloudy-label">
						<value>Cloudy</value>
					</text>
					<text id="light_level-full_sun-label">
						<value>Full Sun</value>
					</text>
					<text id="room_location-label">
						<value>Room Location</value>
					</text>
					<text id="plant_surfaces-label">
						<value>Plant Surfaces</value>
					</text>
					<text id="plant_surfaces-table-label">
						<value>Table</value>
					</text>
					<text id="plant_surfaces-chair-label">
						<value>Chair</value>
					</text>
					<text id="plant_surfaces-window-label">
						<value>Window</value>
					</text>
					<text id="plant_surfaces-shelf-label">
						<value>Shelf</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/room_name" ref="/data/room_name">
			<label ref="jr:itext('room_name-label')" />
		</input>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/description" ref="/data/description">
			<label ref="jr:itext('description-label')" />
		</input>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/room_id" ref="/data/room_id" appearance="numeric">
			<label ref="jr:itext('room_id-label')" />
		</input>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/room_barcode" ref="/data/room_barcode">
			<label ref="jr:itext('room_barcode-label')" />
		</input>
		<group vellum:ref="#form/water_info" ref="/data/water_info">
			<label ref="jr:itext('water_info-label')" />
			<input vellum:ref="#form/water_info/distance_from_window_cm" ref="/data/water_info/distance_from_window_cm">
				<label ref="jr:itext('water_info/distance_from_window_cm-label')" />
			</input>
			<input vellum:ref="#form/water_info/min_water_required" ref="/data/water_info/min_water_required">
				<label ref="jr:itext('water_info/min_water_required-label')" />
			</input>
		</group>
		<select1 vellum:ref="#form/light_level" ref="/data/light_level">
			<label ref="jr:itext('light_level-label')" />
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('light_level-low_light-label')" />
				<value>low_light</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('light_level-shade-label')" />
				<value>shade</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('light_level-cloudy-label')" />
				<value>cloudy</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('light_level-full_sun-label')" />
				<value>full_sun</value>
			</item>
		</select1>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/room_location" ref="/data/room_location">
			<label ref="jr:itext('room_location-label')" />
		</input>
		<select vellum:ref="#form/plant_surfaces" ref="/data/plant_surfaces">
			<label ref="jr:itext('plant_surfaces-label')" />
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('plant_surfaces-table-label')" />
				<value>table</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('plant_surfaces-chair-label')" />
				<value>chair</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('plant_surfaces-window-label')" />
				<value>window</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('plant_surfaces-shelf-label')" />
				<value>shelf</value>
			</item>
		</select>
	</h:body>
</h:html>
_attachments.15e46e4029944f66806ec73bfb14df5a.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Followup Form</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/04A7C0C9-4BEB-42B9-BB7D-2C7850958464" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Followup Form">
					<default_label />
					<description />
				</data>
			</instance>
			<instance src="jr://instance/casedb" id="casedb" />
			<instance src="jr://instance/session" id="commcaresession" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/default_label" nodeset="/data/default_label" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/description" nodeset="/data/description" type="xsd:string" />
			<setvalue event="xforms-ready" vellum:ref="#form/description" ref="/data/description" vellum:value="#case/description" value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/description" />
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="default_label-label">
						<value>You are updating <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name" /> </value>
					</text>
					<text id="description-label">
						<value>Description</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
		<vellum:hashtags>{"#case/case_name":null,"#case/description":null}</vellum:hashtags>
		<vellum:hashtagTransforms>{"prefixes":{"#case/":"instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/"}}</vellum:hashtagTransforms>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/default_label" ref="/data/default_label" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('default_label-label')" />
		</trigger>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/description" ref="/data/description">
			<label ref="jr:itext('description-label')" />
		</input>
	</h:body>
</h:html>
